1206190.name: Aimlabs - Holiday Charity Skins
1206190.description:
About this Holiday Charity Skin Pack:
100% of all profits go directly to Gamers Outreach charity

We have partnered with Gamers Outreach to provide hospitalized kids with video game stations.

Get access to a variety of holiday-themed skins to enhance your gaming experience.
2 New Holiday Avatar Skins for Third Person Gameplay:

  • Ugly Sweater
  • Reindeer

7 New Holiday Weapon Skins

  • Desert Eagle
  • Pulse Rifle
  • Venom/BioDart Sniper Rifle
  • High Noon Revolver
  • Tactical Shotgun
  • Pulse-Blaster/Guardian-Blaster/Light-Blaster
  • Justice/Lightning Gun Rocket Launcher

About Gamers Outreach

Who They Are:

They started as a group of high schoolers with a passion for playing video games. After volunteering at our local hospital, they realized there were specific ways games could help children cope with long-term visits. They’ve since evolved into a community of gaming enthusiasts eager to make a difference for kids in hospitals everywhere!

Why It’s Important:

Undergoing medical treatment can often be a scary and isolating experience, especially for young people. There is a special need for age-appropriate coping tools in pediatric hospitals. Gamers Outreach programs help aid the healing process by providing relief, socialization, and a sense of normalcy to families and patients spending time inside hospitals.

What They Do:

Their focus is to support kids and teens throughout the healing process as they undergo treatment in hospitals. They equip nurses and child life specialists with the means to make activities and technology accessible. Ultimately, their goal is to create sustainable experiences that produce joy and minimize trauma for patients.
